incident_updates.body: After further investigation, it was determined that Twilio create message endpoint was degraded for 3 minutes between 05:00 and 05:03 Pacific Time on 01/20/2024. incidents.name: Twilio Flex Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex was degraded for 15 minutes between 2:45 PM and 3:00 PM Pacific Time on 1/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues loading in Twilio Flex. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Studio Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Studio was degraded between 12/19/2023 10:18 AM to 1/18/2024 4:01 PM Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced 81002 errors found during Studio execution. The issue has now been resolved. If you are still experiencing this issue please create a Support ticket for further assistance.

incidents.name: Failures With Branded Registrations

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issues with branded registrations. This incident has been resolved.
Branded registrations are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified the issue with branded calling and are still working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with branded calling and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with branded calling. Due to this issue, customers who might have created a Voice Integrity bundle for an account before 12/6 but registered Branded Calling for that account after 12/6, might not see their calls being branded on end user handsets. We have identified a workaround for customers who are affected and this can be applied via a support ticket to Twilio's technical support team. We will update in 4 hours or as soon as we have more information.

We continue experiencing an issue with branded calling. Customers who might have created Voice Integrity bundle before 12/6 but started branded registration after 12/6 might not see their calls being branded on end user handsets. We will update in 2 hours or as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Accsec Indonesia API Error

incident_updates.body: Latency and timeout errors for the Twilio Rest API have been resolved, and Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth is operating normally at this time.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. We will provide an update in 12 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AmericaNet network in Brazil. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AmericaNet network in Brazil. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AmericaNet in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AmericaNet in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AmericaNet network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures and Delays to Algar Telecom in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery failures and delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom in Brazil.. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing successful SMS delivery to Algar Telecom in Brazil.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures and delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures and delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with message delivery failures and delays to Algar Telecom in Brazil. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
